Privacy Policy

Effective Date: June 20, 2025

Itero Motivation Engine is a Trello Power-Up that enhances productivity and motivation through gamification. We value your privacy and only collect the minimum data necessary to operate the features you choose to use.

Data We Collect

  • Your Trello member ID (used to link your progress)
  • Mood logs and XP progress (if you interact with those features)

Data We Do NOT Collect

  • No card names, board titles, or sensitive Trello content
  • No tracking across other boards or services

Data Storage

All personal progress data is stored securely and privately. We do not sell or share your information with any third parties.

Contact

For questions or data deletion requests, email: support@iterohq.com
